about_the_game:
Girls & Airplanes & City construction

Experience managing and building your own island in a relaxed atmosphere!

You and your adventure partner flew a plane and accidentally discovered a small island that had never been recorded on the map. What's even more surprising is that you became the lord of this island, making it your mission to prosper. People from other cities helped you build infrastructure - an airport and a rail transit line. Arranged airport flights to acquire resources to build various buildings, bring tourists and residents, expand the airport, purchase or "create" new planes, recruit new members in the future, and start a new story...

There is a small plane at the airport that can be piloted by yourself. Try flying the plane to visit the island you have built!

On this island, create our own miraculous blueprint.


・Characteristics

Immersive experience from a first person perspective, without the need for any image definition, allowing you to directly explore the urban scenery of your created island from a first person perspective, and embark on a brand new story, leaving behind beautiful memories

A small propeller airplane that can be operated with a keyboard, try flying the airplane to complete excellent flights!

You can watch the entire process of the airplane from taxiing to taking off after the flight mission is assigned

Watch the city scenery or watch airplanes at the tower. In the future...

Buildings do not require upgrades

You can hid UI, start your story on the island with an unobstructed view

Entriable subway and go to reach one of the three stations

・CV
Solar VOICEVOX:四国めたん


・[Early Access] Some currently known situations:

(1) Residents of the island: The island needs more residents to become lively, and future version updates will make the island more than just you and your adventure partners. Now we have tourists :)

(2) Title: "Magic": This project is a possibility that I created while creating the theme project "DeMiriam Magic". I think I need to create a relaxed atmosphere, so this project is here. How to reflect "magic" in this project has been something I have been thinking about. At the same time, I hope everyone can look forward to the novel "DeMiriam Magic" that I have been working on since 2016 (although it has not been published yet), which may be released soon.

(3) Regarding first person perspective: I hope to provide players with an immersive experience, so players will act from a first person perspective. In some cases, construction may not be very convenient... Therefore, I am also considering some solutions


・Contact me
You can add my Skype through my email address.

highlighted.name: The victory of the first Rock-Parer-Scissor game
Five victories in the Rock-Parer-Scissor gaming

detailed_description:
Girls & Airplanes & City construction

Experience managing and building your own island in a relaxed atmosphere!

You and your adventure partner flew a plane and accidentally discovered a small island that had never been recorded on the map. What's even more surprising is that you became the lord of this island, making it your mission to prosper. People from other cities helped you build infrastructure - an airport and a rail transit line. Arranged airport flights to acquire resources to build various buildings, bring tourists and residents, expand the airport, purchase or "create" new planes, recruit new members in the future, and start a new story...

There is a small plane at the airport that can be piloted by yourself. Try flying the plane to visit the island you have built!

A small propeller airplane that can be operated with a keyboard, try flying the airplane to complete excellent flights!

You can watch the entire process of the airplane from taxiing to taking off after the flight mission is assigned

(1) Residents of the island: The island needs more residents to become lively, and future version updates will make the island more than just you and your adventure partners. Now we have tourists :)

(2) Title: "Magic": This project is a possibility that I created while creating the theme project "DeMiriam Magic". I think I need to create a relaxed atmosphere, so this project is here. How to reflect "magic" in this project has been something I have been thinking about. name: DeMiriam Magic: Blueprint of Miracle

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy DeMiriam Magic: Blueprint of Miracle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Create your sweet memories with the girls on the island, manage and build your own island in a relaxed atmosphere, operate the island's airport, and try driving a small plane to visit the island you have built
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
